sentences: Suzanne G. Cusick (born 1954) is a music historian and musicologist living in and working in New York City, where she is a Professor of Music at the Faculty of Arts and Science at the New York University.
Her specialties are  the music of seventeenth-century Italy, feminist approaches to music history and criticism, and queer studies in music.
Suzanne Cusick was made an honorary member of the American Musicological Society in November 2014.
